snippet: The completion of the deal has been slowed by regulators’ concerns that Mikhail Fridman or his company might be targeted by expanded sanctions on the Russian energy industry stemming from the Ukraine conflict.
abstract: British government hopes to block sale of German utility RWE to Russian billionaire Mikhail Fridman; fears he or his company L1 Energy might become target of expanded sanctions on Russian energy industry stemming from Ukraine conflict.
lead_paragraph: The completion of the deal has been slowed by regulators’ concerns that Mikhail Fridman or his company might be targeted by expanded sanctions on the Russian energy industry stemming from the Ukraine conflict.

headline.main: Britain, Wary of Sanctions, Adds Pressure to Keep Russian From Buying Energy Unit
headline.print_headline: Britain, Wary of Sanctions, Adds Pressure to Keep Russian From Buying Energy Unit
